props.prop: SELECT FEATURE_NAME, SUM(LINES_NUMBER), ID_FEATURE FROM FEATURES_IN_VARIATIONPOINTS INNER JOIN VARIATION_POINT ON ID_VARIATIONPOINT=IDVARIATIONPOINT WHERE ID_FEATURE!='NO FEATURE'GROUP BY FEATURE_NAME;

SELECT IDVARIATIONPOINT, LINES_NUMBER, C.IDCOREASSET, NAME, VP.EXPRESSION FROM FEATURES_IN_VARIATIONPOINTS INNER JOIN VARIATION_POINT VP ON ID_VARIATIONPOINT=IDVARIATIONPOINT INNER JOIN CORE_ASSET C ON ID_COREASSET=C.IDCOREASSET WHERE LOWER(ID_FEATURE)=?;
SELECT C.IDCOREASSET, C.NAME, VP.BODY FROM VARIATION_POINT VP INNER JOIN CORE_ASSET C ON VP.IDCOREASSET=C.IDCOREASSET WHERE VP.IDVARIATIONPOINT=?;

SELECT A.ID_FEATURE, B.ID_FEATURE FROM FEATURE_BRIDGE A LEFT JOIN FEATURE_BRIDGE B ON B.ID_FEATURE_GROUP = A.ID_FEATURE_GROUP WHERE A.ID_FEATURE!='No feature' and A.ID_FEATURE in (:ids) and B.ID_FEATURE IN (:ids);
SELECT ID_FEATURE, COUNT(DISTINCT(ID_FEATURE_GROUP)) FROM FEATURE_BRIDGE WHERE ID_FEATURE IN (:ids) GROUP BY ID_FEATURE;
